general_info.name: Via Leonina 71
general_info.description: Elegant apartment in the heart of Monti, a short walk from the Colosseum and Roman Forum. Perfect for exploring Romeâ€™s history, culture, and nightlife.

wifi.note: Router is located near the living room shelf. Restart if connection is slow.

check_in.instructions: Main door: code 7171 + key symbol or round key. Apartment door: use the long square-ended key, pull the door towards you, and turn counterclockwise.
check_in.early_check_in: Available on request, subject to availability.

check_out.instructions: Leave the keys on the table inside, close the door, and ensure lights, AC, and appliances are switched off.
check_out.late_check_out: Available on request, subject to availability.

rules: Turn off AC and lights when leaving.
Switch off hot plate after use.
Tie the terrace umbrella to the railing and close it when away.
No parties or loud noises after 10 PM.
